description: Cody Cummings is a very clean guy. He showers at least twice a day, is always smelling great, and he makes sure his house is just as clean...that's why he hires a maid. She happens to be very sexy, but so far, Cody has never laid a finger on the beautiful Halie James. That all changed when he catches her drinking on the job though. Instead of being the nice boss that he normally is, he flied into a rage, grabbing her by the neck and shoving his cock into the dirty maid's mouth. After gagging her with his cock, he gives her a nice hard fuck, making sure she learns her lesson.Enjoy!
title: Maid Fuck
